name: OTMarketingSpeak
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: OTMarketing Speak is a new way to learn about new method tips and trends in the marketing and advertising industry. We're looking for new and exciting ways to deliver content people are looking for and how to get it to them. Take this journey with us.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
